title: Square Gemstone Kada Bangles - A Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Accents. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Contemporary Kada bangle design featuring square-cut gemstones set in a linear arrangement, interspersed with delicate floral CZ motifs. The high polish showcases the rich color of the gold and the brilliance of the gemstones. A modern geometric design with a traditional South Indian feel.
occasions: or as a unique statement piece with contemporary outfits. Also suitable as a stylish addition to Seemantham and Half-Saree functions.
description: These bangles offer a modern interpretation of traditional Indian jewelry. The square-cut gemstones provide a bold, contemporary look, while the CZ accents add a touch of sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. A truly unique piece that blends modern design with South Indian craftsmanship.
